name: gallery-itsamodellistsyncpromise
description: This module extends Y.ModelList by introducing Promised sync-methods. It also transforms Y.ModelList's sync-events into true events with a defaultFunc which can be prevented.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: load-model
examples.displayName: Examine events when loading a modellist
examples.description: Load the modellist by clicking the button. The on- and after-event will appear at the start of loading and at the end.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: loadappend-model
examples.displayName: Append models to a modelllist using loadappend
examples.description: Loadappend the modellist by clicking the button. The on- and after-event will appear at the start of loading and at the end.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: loadpromise-model
examples.description: Load the model by clicking the button. The promise will inform when things get ready.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: preventload-model
examples.description: Load the model by clicking the button. The defaultaction (load) will not execute.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: on-promise
examples.description: Listening to the on-load event and use e.promise for further action.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: error
examples.description: Load the model by clicking the button. A servererror is simulated which will be shown both in the promiseresult as by an throwing error-event.
author: itsasbreuk
